# Integrated Soldier System End User Device (ISS EUD) Tender Announcement
## Call for Proposals (Public Works and Government Services Canada)
### Tender Information
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Date Published | August 19, 2022 |
| Closing Date | October 11, 2022 @ 2:00 PM EDT |
| Tender Classification | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Procurement Method | Lowest Price (Selection Criteria) |

### Opportunity Summary
An Invitation to Bid (ITB) has been issued for the acquisition and support of Integrated Soldier System End User Device (ISS EUD) by the Department of National Defence. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.

### Key Requirements
* No security requirements
* Delivery to sites in Ontario (except National Capital Region) and Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* No specific technical requirements listed

### Instructions for Bidders
All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website, and the following attachments are included:
* 11 documents in English
* 11 documents in French

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
* Name: Xiao Tanya
* Title: 
* Phone: (873) 355-1225
* Email: [tanya.xiao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.xiao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5.
